title: National Capital Parks-East: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       National Capital Parks - East is comprised of multiple site, please visit the individual site webpages to find out about specific saftey tips. Remember to stay hydrated, bring ample water, be awar of ticks and poison ivy, check local weather and dress accordingly. Pets have to be restrained on a leash no longer than 6ft. In parks with trails please be aware of pedestrains and bikers, please share the trail.
